import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react'; import {useForm} from "react-hook-form" import './Forms.css' const Form = () => { const {register,handleSubmit,formState:{errors}}=useForm(); const [userinfo,setUserinfo]=useState() const onSubmit=(data)=>{ setUserinfo(data); console.log(data) } console.log(errors) return ( 
{JSON.stringify(userinfo)}

RegisterForm





{errors.username?.message}





{errors.email?.message}





{errors.password?.message}

) } export default Form
